動物用藥品名稱: 馬爾他雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎、傳染性華氏囊病感染。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS(LA SOTASTRAIN): 10^9EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION. INACTIVATED INFECTIOUSBRONCHITIS VIRUS( MASSACHUSETTS M41 STRAIN): 10^7.5EID50 BEFOREINACTIVATION. INACTIVATED GUMBORO DISEASE VIRUS(WINTERFIELD 2512STRAIN): 10^6EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATIO. SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 0.037ML. LIGHT MINERAL OIL 0.337ML. THIMEROSAL 50UG.
